[[inst_hl_lbip]]
==== HL.LBIP

*Syntax:* hl.lbip [SrcL, simm], ->Dst0, Dst1

*Description:* Long immediate variant supporting extended address range (48-bit).

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_lbip.svg[HL.LBIP encoding,width=800]

*Group:* LDA/PAIR
